== Introduction ==

Mr. Bagus is an Ubuntu user since 2009. Although he is still trying to be geek, he can share what he learned, how-to install and fix problem on Linux system as long as he can solve it. You can read his post about  experience, problem solving, unsolved problem, tips and trick on GNU/Linux <nowiki>[[http://bagustris.blogspot.jp/search/label/GNU%2FLinux | here]]</nowiki>. Mr. Bagus is willing to learn and share his Linux experience by going to caf√©, drink a cup of coffee, and hacking his Laptops while talking about open source and Future of Ubuntu. He learn about unity, dash, lens, libreoffice, apt-get, libreoffice (writer, calc, impress), and many more CLI (command line interface) on terminal. Currently Mr. Bagus is with <nowiki>[[ http:--vibrastic.ep.its.ac.id | VibrasticLab ]]</nowiki> as researcher and engineer. Most of computer in his lab installed with Ubuntu LTS version.
